attributes.action: to ensure that all the guess work is taken out of the initial breast cancer diagnosis and that every woman with a breast lump concern, no matter what her age will be given a mammogram or the equivalent within 30 days of seeing a doctor.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "to ensure that all the guess work is taken out of the initial breast cancer diagnosis and that every woman with a breast lump concern, no matter what her age will be given a mammogram or the equivalent within 30 days of seeing a doctor."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21822


Prime Minister's Office
